SharedScripts.Name: SABnzbd
SharedScripts.Description: Class that interacts with the SABnzbd API

SharedScripts.Name: FileFlows API
SharedScripts.Description: Class that interacts with the FileFlows API

ProcessScripts.Name: SABnzbd - Pause Downloads
ProcessScripts.Description:
Pauses SABnzbd if the current file processing queue is greater than 30 files
If the processing queue is not greater than 30 files, then it will resume SABnzbd

FlowScripts.Name: test.js
FlowScripts.Description: Checks if a file is older than the specified days

FlowScripts.Name: 7Zip - Compress to Zip.js
FlowScripts.Description: Requires a 7Zip tool to be configured and will zip files

FlowScripts.Name: Video - Has 5.1 Audio.js
FlowScripts.Description: Determines if a video has a 5.1 channel track

FlowScripts.Name: Video - Resolution.js
FlowScripts.Description: Determines a video's resolution and outputs accordingly

FlowScripts.Name: Video - Downscale greater than 1080p.js
FlowScripts.Description:
If a video's resolution is greater than 1080p, this script will set the variable {EncodingParameters} to downscale the video to 1080p.
Used with the VideoEncode node.

FlowScripts.Name: Video - Bitrate greater than.js
FlowScripts.Description: Checks if a video's bitrate is greater than specified.

FlowScripts.Name: Video - Has Audio.js
FlowScripts.Description: Checks if there is an audio track on a video file

FlowScripts.Name: NVIDIA - Below Encoder Limit.js
FlowScripts.Description: Checks the count of NVIDIA encodes currently processing and see if it is below a limit

FlowScripts.Name: File - Older Than.js
FlowScripts.Description: Checks if a file is older than the specified days
